DOC.brief_summary: Compared family-based skills training (aka, Behavioral Family Systems Therapy) to youth with poorly controlled type 1 diabetes and their parents either face-to-face or over SkypeTM. Examined the differential impact on the youth's adherence to the diabetes medical regimen and the youth's blood sugar control.
DOC.brief_title: Skype for Youth With Poorly Controlled Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Youth between the ages of 12 and 18 with type 1 diabetes characterized by an HbA1c value great than 9% Caregivers willing to participate Family members reading English at 5th grade level Willing to be randomized. Youth with intellectual disability Parent or youth who doesn't speak English
